docs.text: Builds ¶ A player in WvW is only as good as his build will allow him to be. It is important to select a build that fits your team composition properly. See below for our recommended builds, sorted into primary categories based primary class. Guardian Builds ¶ Condi Guardian Powerful ranged damage dealer with good boon application and strong damage mitigation Visit Build Power Dragonhunter Excellent burst damage as well as long-fight damage while providing top-class boon corruption to the enemy Visit Build Power Guardian Arguably the best healing for the team, with excellent utility with strong stealth, cleanse, and barrier to buff allies Visit Build Support Firebrand Excellent utility and support, one of the stronger healers and most useful utility classes for a group Visit Build Revenant Builds ¶ Condi Renegade Powerful ranged damage dealer with good boon application and strong damage mitigation Visit Build Power Herald Powerful ranged damage dealer with good boon application and strong damage mitigation Visit Build Power Renegade Powerful ranged damage dealer with good boon application and strong damage mitigation Visit Build Power Revenant Powerful ranged damage dealer with good boon application and strong damage mitigation Visit Build Power Vindicator Powerful ranged damage dealer with good boon application and strong damage mitigation Visit Build More Builds ¶ Dummy Build Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. docs.title: Power dragonhunter

docs.text: Guardian Power Backline DPS Power Guardian ¶ The Power Dragonhunter provides an enormous amount of damage, both ranged and melee, with a moderate amount of support utility skills. Guardian's of any type are highly coveted in groups due to their easy access to the Stability boon. Gear ¶ Optimal Armor Stats Full Dragon's Stats Armor Trinkets Armor Trinkets Tip This armor and stat selection gives the most optimize selection of gear to maximizing DPS while still meeting the 20k HP threshold.
